participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Curious and a bit impatient, she seeks interaction and enjoys expressing her thoughts.
participant_1.background: i ride the bus to school. my brother is older than me. i'm 13 years old. i hate math class.

participant_2.name: Mr. Johnson
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and wise, he has a passion for helping others and enjoys sharing his experiences.
participant_2.background: i was poor growing up. i am a retired gym teacher. cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i like watching war documentaries.
